Description: Verify that bookmarks appear at the standard(4) access points

Verify that bookmarks are properly added to bookmarks file and appear
      in all access points.

Verify that bookmarks are properly deleted from bookmarks file and
      disappear from all access points.

Verify that changes to an item are saved without loss of item
      integrity.
Verify separators are properly added/deleted.

Verify that view properties works as appropriate for bookmarks,
      folders, and separators(negative)
Verify that columns are resizable to show/hide more of entries
Show and hide columns.
Verify that several bookmarks are deleted at one time.

Verify that it is NOT possible to drop an item onto itself or its
      immediate parent or child

Determine whether extremely large text blocks can be copied from web
      pages.

Determine whether extremely large images can be copied from web
      pages.

Determine whether text can be copied and pasted from text fields
      within a dialog box.

Confirm that dragging a link from the browser window
      onto the desktop creates a shortcut.

Verify that dragging onto a frame-set
      page loads the dragged content properly.

Confirm that text, links, and images dragged to a
      non-modal dialog are handled properly

Feature: D&D from the desktop – Text files
Description:
Confirm that dragging a text file to the browser
      window displays the document contents

Confirm that dragging a supported image file
       to the browser window display the file

Determine if the Bookmark Manager properly handles
      items dragged onto it.

Verify that you can drag a bookmark from the Bookmarks menu
      to the Personal Toolbar.

Verify that you can stop a form's data from being saved from
      the popup dialog box, and you click no.

Verify that if you delete data in the Form Manager then
      click cancel, the data has not been deleted

Verify that you have the ability to search by typing keyword
        synonyms, and verbs to bring up related topics in help content. Verify
        that if the entered phrase may not actually exist in the help document,
        but it is related to topic.

Verify that is it is possible to have favorite help topics -
        similar to IE help which has a special tab to add favorite help
        topics.

Verify that there is Troubleshooting Help about the problem "if you
        can't sign on"
Verify the functionality of the forward/back buttons in Help

Verify that minimization, maximize and close buttons of the toolbar
        invoke the correct behavior

Verify that page up and down, in fact, page up and down in
        help

Verify that you can move around pages with the up and down arrow
        keys

Determine whether Understanding Privacy help content displays
        correctly

Determine whether Creating web pages help content displays
        correctly
Determine whether Security and Privacy displays correctly
Determine whether Streamlined Interface displays correctly
Determine whether International Users displays correctly
Determine whether the About Netscape displays correctly

Determine that you can open all the selections in the Help drop
        down menu using short cut buttons.

Verify that the correct link is recorded after a server
        redirect.
Delete multiple History entries
Clear all of history

Verify recently visited sites are in Back and Forward button
        dropdown menu and work.

Determine that after resizing an image to it's original size, it is
        possible to resize to window again.

Determine that it is possible to print an image without changing
        the currently loaded page

Determine whether reloaded web pages properly display images
        modified since the last load.

Determine whether images load directly into the web browser from a
        networked server.

Determine whether images load directly into the web browser from a
        local hard drive.

Determine whether an automatically updated web cam continues to
        refresh over an extended (24 hour) period of time.

Determine whether displaying animated GIFs result in single server
        request for the image, rather than additional requests upon each frame
        change.

Determine whether GIF 87 images are properly displayed across
        different bit depths.

Determine whether the web brower gracefully deals with unusual,
        corrupted, or invalid GIF images.

Test applets within <embed>, <applet> and 
  <object> tags
Test applets with liveconnect

Verify that the process to replace a forgotten master password is
      easier/more discoverable (though encrypted information should still be
      lost to the user who has forgotten their password).

Verify that the browser behaves correctly after selections are made
      in the save password dialog box

Verify that when the password manager has been disabled, it is no
      longer in use, even for passwords already saved

Need a good working case for this, working on
      it

Verify that when you have saved a username and password for a website
      and you later change the password, that password manager picks up the new
      password

Verify that when you enable password manager from the preferences
      panel, you are asked if you would like to save usernames and passwords
      and get prefilled info on sites

Verify that when you have saved a username and password in password
      manager, this information can be viewed in the password manager through
      preferences

Verify that you can remove a username and password for a given site
      and it will no longer autofill on that sight nor will it be listed in
      password manager (netscape.com)

Verify that you can remove all username and password information and
      it will no longer autofill nor will anything be listed in password
      manager (lycos.com)

Verify that you can remove a site and username from the passwords
      never saved section of password manager

Determine if a page with portrait and Landscape settings prints
        properly
Determine if paragraph styles print correctly
Determine that print range works properly
Determine if Acrobat plugin works properly
Determine if windows media player works fine

Verify that clicking search button will search text entered in
      URLBar.

Verify that a basic search from within the Search tab can be
      executed
Verify that a search query/results can be bookmarked
Determine whether the double-click gesture functions properly.

Determine whether text from a JavaScript applet is properly
        selected in conjunction with other page content.
Verify list of available remote panels
Verify list of available local panels
Verify that What's Related lists related sites
Verify that links in What's Related panels work

Verify that unselecting panels from Add menu removes panels from
        the Sidebar

Determine that interface features (buttons, textfield, droplist)
        appear and behave as expected. Includes tests to dismiss dialog.

Open web location in a Composer window. Includes test to dismiss
        dialog.

Use of the native Mac OS file picker to navigate through
        directories and open files (html, plaintext, image). Cancellation also
        tested.

Feature: Basic access of Find and Find Again
Description: Access from main menu, keyboard accelerator, access keys.

Feature: Basic find in page and frame content
Description:
Find in html page and html frame documents. Test Find Again and
        cancellation. Test for NOFRAME content.

Find using solely whitespace, null, and string with
        prepended/appended whitespace.
Access from main menu, keyboard accelerator, access keys.
View source of plaintext, xml page, ftp listing.

Scrolling and keyboard navigation within the source window. Also
        should be able to use keyboard accelerators. Resize source window.
View info for a webpage, frame and frameset.

Scrolling and keyboard navigation within the info window. Also
        should be able to use [applicable] keyboard accelerators. Resize source
        window. Manipulate the grippy.

Verify both Classic and Modern exist under the themes
        preferences
Verify Classic theme works as advertised
Verify if themes exist under View menu

Feature: Verify all the selectable items work under Classic theme
Description:
Click through all the items on menu bar, tool bars, and floating
        component bar under Classic theme

Feature:
Verify all the selectable items on other applications under
        Classic theme
Description:
Click through all the items on menu bar and tool bars under AIM,
        Composer, Mail and Address book to see all the looks and feel are
        consistence under Classic theme
Test all the items under "Apply Theme" under View menuSelecting "Theme Preferences"Get New ThemesClassicModern
Click upper-right (upper left on Mac) to close

Grab left/right window edge and drag to resize. Not available on
        Mac.
Click in the scrollbar area to page up/down.

Verify that Personal and Navigation bars can be expanded and
        collapsed
Verify correct bookmarks are installed in Bookmarks bar.
Verify that each buttons executes as appropriate.
Verify that component buttons work and behave as appropriate.
